pr_title: chore: finish wiring up unwrapped keys

timeline.message:
chore: finish wiring up unwrapped keys

fixes: https://github.com/confluentinc/ksql/issues/6209

This finishes the wiring of the `WRAP_SINGLE_KEYS` option up.

timeline.bodyText: Dropped these in favour of findAny, which is more generic.
timeline.author: big-andy-coates

timeline.bodyText: key features are now returned as key features, not value features!
timeline.author: big-andy-coates

timeline.bodyText: Does it make sense to assume all serde options will always be either key- or value-specific, never both nor neither? Can't think of why this wouldn't be true in the future but seemed worth double-checking.
timeline.author: vcrfxia

replies.bodyText:
That's the assumption at the moment.  If that changes... we change the code! ;)
Ideally, we'd ditch SerdeOption and just keep SerdeFeature, but that's a bigger change.
replies.author: big-andy-coates
